amendment.description: Amendment strikes the $150 million for Regional Ocean Partnership grants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 113-1 to strike $150,000,000 for Regional Ocean Partnership grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 197 (Roll no. 16).

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Flores to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A003).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
